description: i. Letter dated 30 July 2009 from Rt Hon John Healey MP to Dr Phyllis Starkey MP on measures to improve the planning applications process. 2 p. ii. DCLG consultation on detailed proposals and draft regulations for the introduction of the Community Infrastructure Levy. 164 p. iii. Draft regulations and reference documents for the consultation on the introduction of the Community Infrastructure Levy. 69 p. iv. Partial Impact Assessment for the consultation on the introduction of hte Community Infrastructure Levy. 20 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
